name: fibre, flax, short, scutched to generic market for silky fibres | silky fibre | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/30164/documentation

This is a renaming activity. It's purpose is to link 'fibre, flax, short, scutched' to the generic 'market for silky fibres'. This dataset should not be used if it's contribution to the overall result is important.

Activity starts with the reception of 'fibre, flax, short, scutched'.

Activity ends with the 'silky fibres'.
